mapper.sql: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_code, m.menu_type, m.path, m.view_path, m.permissions, m.icon, m.sort, m.status from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_role_user ru on ru.role_id = r.role_id
mapper.select: where m.status = '1' and r.status = '1' and (m.menu_type = '1' or m.menu_type = '2') and ru.user_id = #{userId} order by m.parent_id, m.sort
where m.status = '1' and (m.menu_type = '1' or m.menu_type = '2') order by m.parent_id, m.sort

where 1 = 1
AND m.status = #{status}
AND m.menu_name like concat('%', #{menuName}, '%')
order by m.parent_id, m.sort
